## IContainer.savePropertyData() method

Save property metadata to the container.

**Signature:**

```typescript
savePropertyData(decoratorNameKey: string | symbol, data: any, target: Function | object, propertyName: string | symbol): void;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

</td><td>

</td><td>

The metadata to be saved


</td></tr>

</td><td>

Function \| object


</td><td>

The target class or object


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

propertyName


</td><td>

string \| symbol


</td><td>

The name of the property


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void

## Example


```ts
container.savePropertyData('key', 'value', UserService, 'property');
```
